title: Privacy First
content: Your screen is where you think. ScreenHint will never steal (or sell) any of your personal data, and nothing is stored without your permission.

title: Intuitive
content: You can copy hints just like you'd expect to, and you can paste them on anywhere you can paste images.

title: Relatable
content: Toss things around your desktop just like a real workspace.

title: Flexible
content: Pin hints to desktops, resize them, even extract text from them using computer vision.
